DOC.brief_summary: Patients satisfy immediate load protocol two implant join complete mandibular overdenture .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Loading Of Dental Implants : A Pilot Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Minimal age 18 year Complete edentulism 1 year Wear total conventional prosthesis 1 year Bone morphology anterior mandibular region amendable placement 3 regular diameter implant without additional procedure ( graft membrane ) . Any absolute relative contraindication implant therapy Physical incapacity render oral prosthetic hygiene Incapacity obtain free inform consent Incapacity assist plan follow appointment Incapacity understand complete questionnaire Exclusion Criteria Immediate Loading Protocol Found One Both Unsplinted Implants During Surgery : Inadequate bone quality : IT < 35 Ncm Inadequate primary stability : ISQ < 60
